1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Zaid Al-Ansari said:"The Messenger of Allah came to us and asked us for water for ablution. I brought water to him and he rinsed his mouth and sniffed water up into his nostrils from one handful

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَضْمَضَةِ وَالاِسْتِنْشَاقِ مِنْ كَفٍّ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: Rinsing the mouth and sniffing up water into the nostrils with one handful of water
